channel.title: Fundraising on CBHS Project Graduation
channel.description: Recent content in Fundraising on CBHS Project Graduation

item.title: Bingo Sponsorship
item.description: Sponsor For A Game….Get A Shout Out for $20! We will announce your company, your sales pitch/what your are known for, prior to the start of a bingo game!! This advertisement reaches hundreds of people for only: $20.00! Donate today! Thank you. The Mailman is on His Way :) Sorry, don't know what happened. Try later :( Send Message

item.title: Car Wash
item.description: Saturday, September 21, 9am-1pm, Anacapri Pizza, 605 N Atlantic Avenue, Cocoa Beach. Tickets: $5

item.title: Spaghetti Dinner
item.description: Friday, September 20, 4-6pm, Elks Club, 175 N Brevard, Cocoa Beach. Tickets: $10 each

item.title: CBHS Yard Sign
item.description: Proud of your Cocoa Beach Senior? Let them know, order a yard sign!!! Orders and payment are now being taken for Senior Yard Signs. Small signs personalized are $20, not personalized are $18. Large signs personalized are $40, not personalized are $38. Weather resistant sign measures 24” wide x 18” high Will be delivered to student at school in April 2020 Signs will be ordered as needed and will be available for purchase through the month of April.

item.title: Flamingo Flocking
item.description:
Congratulations! You’ve been FLOCKED by CBHS Project Graduation! If you walked outside to a yard infested with flamingos, NEVER FEAR, we have a few solutions for you! For a $20 donation you can send your flock packing. For a $25 donation you can choose whose yard the flock will infest next! For just $30 you can purchase FLOCKING INSURANCE to guarantee provide protection against any future flamingo infestation!
Do nothing and the flock will migrate after 48 hours.
